Name: Princess Marina
Ingredients: 15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Delicate yet loaded with alcohol and flavour.
History: Created in the late 1920s/early 1930s and named after the Princess Marina, the late mother of The Duke of Kent, Prince Michael of Kent and Princess Alexandra.
Nutrition: One serving of Princess Marina contains 186 calories
